full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GAR GYI DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI LE LAG DBANG SDUD KYI LAS MTHA' 'PHRUL ZHAGS BTAB TSAD MYUR 'GUGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021B (CES DPAL GAR GYI DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI LE LAG DBANG SDUD KYI LAS MTHA' 'PHRUL @022A *, , ZHAGS BTAB TSAD MYUR 'GUGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI BRGYUD LAS DAM SHOD ZANGS RI'I 'DABS SU SKYES SHING MTSUNGS MED RGYAL DBANG RNAM GNYIS KYI DRIN LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB BCUD SNYING POR GYUR BA DU MAS RGYUD GANG ZHING DAG SNANG PHYOGS MED DU 'BYONGS PA'I, RNAL 'BYOR BA BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES SHING MO YOS BU'I LO MGO ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS DRANG SRONG CHEN PO ZLA BA DAR BA'I DUS SU BDE BA CHEN PO'I, NAGS KHROD RNAM GROL GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
